trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.target: 取得控制項類型<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得子項目的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 由<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>呼叫

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: 子元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得名稱<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: 由<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>呼叫

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "MenuItem".
trans-unit.target: 包含"MenuItem"的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得的文字標籤<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.
trans-unit.target: 由<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>呼叫

trans-unit.source: The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to.
trans-unit.target: Name 屬性可以視為的使用者可以用來說明所參考的控制項的文字字串。

trans-unit.source: It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: 請務必中所有控制項的文字表示[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，您可以透過程式設計方式，以當地語系化的方式參考控制項。

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the label.
trans-unit.target: 包含標籤的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項模式<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生其中一種下列情況下，這個方法會傳回目前<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> has child <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: -`patternInterface`等於<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>與此相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>有子<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> does not have child <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: -`patternInterface`等於<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>與此相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>沒有子系<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> has its checkable property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: -`patternInterface`等於<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>與此相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>其可以核取的屬性設定為`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>, this method returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果`patternInterface`等於<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>，這個方法會傳回該物件會實作<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider>介面。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果支援控制項模式的物件 patternInterface 是支援的值，否則 。
